channel.title: Asterisk Cookbook on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours
channel.description: Recent content in Asterisk Cookbook on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours

item.title: Cooking With Asterisk (Video)
item.description: And I found the Cooking With Asterisk presentation as well! Apologies for the low quality on the video (as this one has a lot more text than the Distributed Call Centre video), but you can follow along with the presentation on your screen as available on my website at: http://leifmadsen.com/sites/default/files/AstriCon%202011%20-%20Cooking%20With%20Asterisk.pdf The video presentation is available here: http://www.tmcnet.com/tmc/videos/default.aspx?vid=5741&title=Cooking+with+Asterisk#
